subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Down by 24 in the third quarter, the Orlando Magic went on a 40-9 run over the next 15 minutes and beat the host Miami Heat, 99-96, on Thursday night.
snippet: Down by 24 in the third quarter, the Orlando Magic went on a 40-9 run over the next 15 minutes and beat the host Miami Heat, 99-96, on Thursday night.
